content: I'm trying to fix #54250, should I document each time I see something like #[cfg(target_has_atomic_load_store = "8")] on types/functions/methods ?
I'm not on any team, but probably

(Better to ask questions like this in #t-libs, fwiw).

But yeah I would say that we should say something like "This is available on targets with atomic loads/stores at least 8 bits wide" or something like that. Would be amazing to link to a list, but I don't know that we have one.
Maybe we should put a list in the atomic module (for the builtin targets)
